job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: The candidate will design, develop and implement Advanced Analytics models that have an impact of increasing sales, reducing costs, or optimizing the the company's assets.Solution Design And DeliveryDUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIESHelp guide evaluation of Advanced Analytics use cases/projects and define requirements for modelsApply and advise on state-of-the-art advanced analytic and quantitative tools and modeling techniques in order to derive business insights, solve complex business problems and improve decisionsMaintain and ensure that documentation, deliverables, and governance follows PMO standard architecture management process and delivers expected results.Client Relationship ManagementCollaborate closely with internal and external teams to understand and apply changes/modifications to deliver maximum business benefit for reporting / data warehousing capabilities.Engages with Business counterparts in order to remain informed on business objectives and priorities.May be expected to deliver programs/projects that cross functional client areas and have more than one business sponsor, representing different business functions.Provides subject matter expert input into the Development of a multi-year Advanced Analytics RoadmapMaintains positive and trusted working relationships with all business and internal stakeholders.Interpersonal SkillsStrong communications skills and ability to communicate analytical and technical content in an easy to understand wayIntellectual curiosity, along with excellent problem-solving and quantitative skills, including the ability to disaggregate issues, identify root causes and recommend solutionsStrong people skills, team-orientation, and a professional attitudeBuilds and maintains relationships that motivate, guide, and/or reinforce the best practice use of Advanced Analytics solutions.Develops self and others to improve performance in current role and to prepare for future roles; seeks and provides feedback and coaching to enhance performance.Subject Matter ExpertiseMaintains influential knowledge of industry trends / innovations in strategic areas of importance.EducationQualifications:Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field like Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics or related field required.Advanced degree (Masters or PhD) preferredExperienceMinimum 3 years of hands-on data analysis experienceProficiency in Python, Scala, R, SAS, SPSS or other statistical packagesAdvanced knowledge of wide range of statistical and data mining techniques (regression, decision trees, clustering, neural networks, etc.)Experience in working with large datasets in relational and distributed databasesKnowledge of additional programming languages is a plus (Python, C++, Java etc.)
